医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，对于终末期心力衰竭患者，消融比药物治疗更有效根据今天在 ESC 热线会议上发表的最新突破性研究，与终末期心力衰竭患者的药物治疗相比，心房颤动消融可降低死亡率、紧急心脏移植或左心室辅助装置 (LVAD) 植入率2023 年国会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Ablation-more- effective-than-medical-therapy-in-患者-with-end-stage-heart-failure-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Ablation-more- effective-than-medical-therapy-in-患者-with-end-stage-heart-failure-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1874147-b11f-455f-92b4-76b67fc0525e Mon, 28 Aug 2023 14:05:11 -0400 Ablation more effective than medical therapy in patients with end-stage heart failure, study shows
机会较高或脆弱性较低的社区与儿童哮喘风险较低有关哈佛朝圣者卫生保健研究所的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，居住在早年机会较多或脆弱性较低的社区可能与儿童哮喘风险降低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Neighborhoods-with-higher-opportunity-or-lower-vulnerability-linked-to-lower-risk-of-pediatric-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Neighborhoods-with-higher-opportunity-or-lower-vulnerability-linked-to-lower-risk-of-pediatric-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94badf2a-c585-43c7-a35a-70870a864c70 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 13:47:16 -0400 Neighborhoods with higher opportunity or lower vulnerability linked to lower risk of pediatric asthma
生理学引导的完全血运重建可减少老年心肌梗死患者的缺血事件根据今日在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上发表的最新研究成果，对于 75 岁或以上患有多支血管疾病的心肌 (MI) 梗死患者，生理学引导的完全血运重建与单纯血运重建相比，可减少缺血事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Physiology-guided-complete-reangioization-reduces-ischemic-events-in-older-MI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Physiology-guided-complete-reangioization-reduces-ischemic-events-in-older-MI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8e2a969-df8b-4d16-87d3-868d9e3a5ed7 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 13:20:39 -0400 Physiology-guided complete revascularization reduces ischemic events in older MI patients
ARREST 试验结果问题需要将所有心脏骤停患者运送到中心一项涉及英国伦敦所有医院的随机试验发现，被救护车送往心脏骤停中心的社区心脏骤停复苏患者与被送往地理位置最近的急诊室的患者相比，30 天生存率没有差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/ARREST-trial-results-question-need-to-transport-all-cardiac-arrest-病人-to-centers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/ARREST-trial-results-question-need-to-transport-all-cardiac-arrest-病人-to-centers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bac03622-42dd-478a-93a1-bcfcc13684fa Mon, 28 Aug 2023 13:07:44 -0400 ARREST trial results question need to transport all cardiac arrest patients to centers
首次口服脂蛋白（a）治疗显示胆固醇显着降低研究负责人、莫纳什大学维多利亚心脏研究所所长 Stephen Nicholls 教授今天宣布，一种新药为脂蛋白（a）提供了世界首创的突破性治疗方法，脂蛋白（a）是胆固醇的一种主要遗传形式，会增加心脏病和中风的风险。心脏医院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/First-oral-treatment-for-Lipo Protein(a)-shows-significant-cholesterol-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/First-oral-treatment-for-Lipo Protein(a)-shows-significant-cholesterol-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=506a145e-c473-40d3-83d8-2b811255f98e Mon, 28 Aug 2023 12:52:29 -0400 First oral treatment for Lipoprotein(a) shows significant cholesterol reduction
研究证实 Kencur 提取物具有抗癌作用您可能知道它是一种为菜肴增添风味的芳香香料，或者是一种缓解胃部不适的舒缓草药，但大阪都立大学的研究人员发现了有希望的发现，Kencur 是一种原产于东南亚的生姜科热带植物。 ，具有抗癌作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-confirms-the-anti-cancer-effects-of-Kencur-extract.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-confirms-the-anti-cancer-effects-of-Kencur-extract.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc2257e7-c7c9-4546-9d23-dd247b3e7d0e Mon, 28 Aug 2023 11:59:35 -0400 Study confirms the anti-cancer effects of Kencur extract
患有 ARDS 的肥胖成人可能受益于 ECMO美国国立卫生研究院支持的一项研究表明，肥胖成人在因呼吸衰竭而接受重症监护时，可能会受益于体外膜肺氧合 (ECMO)（一种先进的呼吸支持形式）的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Obese-adults-with-ARDS-may-benefit-from-ECMO.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Obese-adults-with-ARDS-may-benefit-from-ECMO.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b072902-8cc9-4c9a-a013-f8a7bf738079 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 11:55:26 -0400 Obese adults with ARDS may benefit from ECMO
全面的在线资源允许探索人类癌症突变特征和拓扑特征之间的相互作用用于研究人类癌症突变特征与拓扑特征之间关系的在线资源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/A-compressive-online-resource-allows-for-the-exploration-of-interactions- Between-mutational-signatures-and-topographyal-features-across-人类癌症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/A-compressive-online-resource-allows-for-the-exploration-of-interactions- Between-mutational-signatures-and-topographyal-features-across- human-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89b07986-d4c9-49dd-a263-d8e4387a9d57 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 11:28:00 -0400 A comprehensive online resource allows for the exploration of interactions between mutational signatures and topographical features across human cancer
即使在药物洗脱支架时代，双联抗血小板治疗仍应是 PCI 的标准策略经皮冠状动脉介入治疗（PCI）后使用药物洗脱支架进行普拉格雷单药治疗对于大出血并不优于双联抗血小板治疗（DAPT），但对于急性冠脉综合征（ACS）或高出血风险患者的心血管事件而言并不劣势。 HBR），根据今天在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上提出的最新突破性研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Dual-antiplatelet-therapy-should-remain-the-standard-strategy-for-PCI-even-in-the-drug-eluting-stent-era。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Dual-antiplatelet-therapy-should-remain-the-standard-strategy-for-PCI-even-in-the-drug-eluting-stent-era。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4137a79d-1482-48aa-9dc4-1419e0db2a8d Mon, 28 Aug 2023 10:01:37 -0400 Dual-antiplatelet therapy should remain the standard strategy for PCI even in the drug-eluting stent era
尽管青春期参与度下降，但身体活动习惯普遍持续最近的一项《科学报告》研究阐明了青春期期间根据青春期时间参与和停止体育活动的模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/General-persistence-of-physical-activity-habits-despite-decline-in-participation-during-adolescent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/General-persistence-of-physical-activity-habits-despite-decline-in-participation-during-adolescent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2674c8b7-e666-468a-b54c-975b1ce53b66 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 09:59:00 -0400 General persistence of physical activity habits despite decline in participation during adolescence
